Module org.nasdanika.emf
Package org.nasdanika.emf

Class MermaidTextGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.nasdanika.emf.MermaidTextGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiagramTextGenerator
public class MermaidTextGenerator extends Object implements DiagramTextGenerator
Generates Mermaid.js class diagram (https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/classDiagram) text from Ecore models.
Author:
Pavel Vlasov
